text: Tom Hendrikse (born 11 August 1998) is a Dutch long distance runner. Hendrikse represents Netherlands at international competitions. Hendrikse was not able to run the Dutch qualification time for the marathon at the 2020 Summer Olympics. Until early 2022 Hendrikse had a long injury. He competed at the 2022 European Athletics Championships in the marathon event. ==References== Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch long-distance runners Category:Sportspeople from Drenthe Category:People from Assen
title: Tom Hendrikse
